attributes.action: Bring British Forces back to the UK and refrain from foreign interventions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Curtail overseas military interventions and focus on UK defence by bringing all UK armed forces back to be based in the UK, including the Royal Navy to patrol only UK waters.
The Ministry of Defence should live up to its name and not be an excuse to participate in foreign adventures.
